discovery.label: Discovery
discovery.title: Find Local Businesses
discovery.description: Explore our comprehensive directory of small and medium enterprises near UPN Veteran Jakarta campuses in Limo, Depok and Pondok Labu, South Jakarta. From restaurants to retail, services to suppliers - discover trusted local businesses in your neighborhood.

information.label: Information
information.title: Detailed Business Profiles
information.description: Access complete information about each business including services offered, operating hours, contact details, and customer reviews. Make informed decisions with transparent, up-to-date business information.

connection.label: Connection
connection.title: Support Local Economy
connection.description: Connect directly with business owners and contribute to your local community. Every interaction helps small businesses thrive and strengthens the economy around our Limo and Pondok Labu campuses.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Veteran Market

whatIsMerchantDirectory.question: What is Veteran Market?
whatIsMerchantDirectory.answer: Veteran Market is a comprehensive platform that connects customers with verified small and medium enterprises near UPN Veteran Jakarta campuses in Limo, Depok and Pondok Labu, South Jakarta. We help you discover local businesses, from restaurants and cafes to retail stores and service providers.

isItFree.question: Is it free to browse the directory?
isItFree.answer: Yes! Browsing the Veteran Market is completely free. You can search, filter, and explore all listed businesses without any charges.

doIHaveToRegister.question: Do I have to register to use the directory?
doIHaveToRegister.answer: No, you don't need to register to use the Veteran Market. You can browse the directory and search for businesses without creating an account.

whatTypeOfBusinessCanIDiscover.question: What type of businesses can I discover?
whatTypeOfBusinessCanIDiscover.answer: We list all types of small and medium enterprises operating near UPN Veteran Jakarta campuses in Limo, Depok and Pondok Labu, South Jakarta, including restaurants, cafes, retail stores, service providers, healthcare facilities, educational institutions, and more.

cta.heading: What are you waiting for?
cta.description: Start exploring hundreds of verified merchants near UPN Veteran Jakarta campuses today. Find the perfect business for your needs.

empty.title: No results found
empty.description: We couldn't find what you're looking for

hero.title: Connecting Communities with Local Businesses
hero.description: Merchant Directory is dedicated to empowering small and medium enterprises in South Jakarta by making them more discoverable to the local community.

problem.heading: Local MSMEs Still Struggle to Be Seen in the Digital Age
problem.quote: Indonesia has 65 million MSMEs, but only 25.5 million (39%) have gone digital.

points.point1: Around UPN Veteran Jakarta campuses, MSMEs still rely on manual promotion and word-of-mouth.
points.point2: The issue is not with business quality — but with low digital visibility

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We believe everyone should be able to discover and access local businesses. Our platform is designed with accessibility in mind, ensuring an inclusive experience for all users.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Fast, responsive, and reliable. We optimize every aspect of our platform to ensure quick load times and smooth interactions, making it easy for users to find what they need.

languages.title: Indonesian and English
languages.description: We serve a diverse community. Our platform supports both Indonesian and English languages, making local businesses accessible to everyone in our community.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We maintain high standards for the businesses listed on our platform. Every merchant is verified to ensure accurate information and a trustworthy directory.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Honest information, clear communication, and open processes. We believe transparency builds trust between businesses and the community.

userSubmitted.title: User Submitted Merchants
userSubmitted.description: Allow community members to suggest and submit new businesses to expand our directory.

msmeExpansion.title: MSME Expansion
msmeExpansion.description: Expand our coverage to reach more small and medium enterprises across South Jakarta and beyond.

reviews.title: Review & Rating System
reviews.description: Enable users to share their experiences and help others make informed decisions.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.description: We're here to help you with any questions or concerns you may have.
